favourite.article: Enjoying that Christ is everything here Baton Rouge with all the saints! Praise the Lord!

*****this is missing the third verse which is:******
"Follow the Lord like a charging stallion / Race for the Son with all your might / Guard your heart like a gold medallion / Keep the kingdom full in sight."
Christ is everything! I need Him!
The song is kinda like ' All I need is king Jesus'
